infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Beacon needs your location to share it with emergency coordinators during a crisis.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Beacon needs your location to show your position on the map and share it during emergencies.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: Beacon uses Bluetooth to create mesh networks with nearby users when internet is unavailable.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: Beacon uses Bluetooth to communicate with nearby devices in mesh mode.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Beacon can record audio during a panic event for safety documentation.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Use Face ID to unlock Beacon.
